brainly_data.question: Name two kinds of businesses that you could start in the fashion industry and explain what skills you would need to start them.
brainly_data.subject: Arts

all_answers.question: Name two kinds of businesses that you could start in the fashion industry and explain what skills you would need to start them.
all_answers.subject: Arts
all_answers.text: For example you could start a retail clothing store because you would need to have skills in business and you could start an photography business you would need to have skills in photography. Hope this helps!!!!
